description: `thunder_slb_resource_usage` Provides details about thunder slb resource usage

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

CacheTemplateCount.description: Total configurable HTTP Cache Templates in the System.

ClientSslTemplateCount.description: Total configurable Client SSL Templates in the System.

ConnReuseTemplateCount.description: Total configurable Connection reuse Templates in the System.

FastTcpTemplateCount.description: Total configurable Fast TCP Templates in the System.

FastUdpTemplateCount.description: Total configurable Fast UDP Templates in the System.

HealthMonitorCount.description: Total Health Monitors in the System.

HttpTemplateCount.description: Total configurable HTTP Templates in the System.

NatPoolAddrCount.description: Total configurable NAT Pool addresses in the System.

PbslbSubnetCount.description: Total PBSLB Subnets in the System.

PersistCookieTemplateCount.description: Total configurable Persistent cookie Templates in the System.

PersistSrcipTemplateCount.description: Total configurable Source IP Persistent Templates in the System.

ProxyTemplateCount.description: Total configurable Proxy Templates in the System.

RealPortCount.description: Total Real Server Ports in the System.

RealServerCount.description: Total Real Servers in the System.

ServerSslTemplateCount.description: Total configurable Server SSL Templates in the System.

ServiceGroupCount.description: Total Service Groups in the System.

SlbThresholdResUsagePercent.description: Enter the threshold as a percentage (Threshold in percentage(default is 0%)).

StreamTemplateCount.description: Total configurable Streaming media in the System.

VirtualPortCount.description: Total Virtual Server Ports in the System.

VirtualServerCount.description: Total Virtual Servers in the System.
